notes: Shot dead by a security guard in the industrial zone after he stabbed her and another guard. Media reports stated that the female security guard sustained moderate injuries and the male security guard sustained to moderate to grave injuries.

name: 'Issa Yasin Yusef 'Assaf
notes: Shot dead by Border Police officers after he and another Palestinian stabbed an Israeli civilian to death. The other Palestinian was also shot dead. Another Israeli civilian was killed by the officers’ gunfire.

name: Reuven Birmajer
notes: Stabbed to death near Jaffa Gate. The two assailants were shot dead by Border Police officers, whose gunfire also hit and killed an Israeli civilian. Media reports stated that another Israeli civilian was stabbed and gravely wounded in the incident.

name: 'Anan Muhammad Saleh Hammad
notes: Shot dead by Border Police officers after he and another Palestinian stabbed an Israeli civilian to death. The other Palestinian was also shot dead. Another Israeli civilian was killed by the officers’ gunfire.

name: Nashaat Jamal 'Abd a-Razeq 'Asfur
notes: Critically wounded by soldiers’ gunfire as he was walking home. The soldiers, who fired after Palestinians threw stones at them, were more than a 100 meters away from ‘Asfur. He died later that day in hospital.

name: Mahmoud Muhammad Sa'id al-Agha
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at a protest near the perimeter fence. At the protest, stones were thrown at soldiers standing on the other side of the fence.

name: Muhammad 'Abd a-Rahman Ahmad 'Ayad
notes: Shot dead in his car by soldiers and Border Police officers. According to a statement by the police, he was shot as he accelerated his car, driving at a group of security forces personnel.

name: 'Abdallah Hussein Ahmad Nasasrah
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot in the course of an attempted stabbing attack.

name: Hikmat Faruk Hikmat Hamdan
notes: Shot dead in his car by Border Police. According to media reports, they fired after they suspected he was trying to run them over. B’Tselem’s inquiry indicates that the Border Police officers fire a massive barrage at the car. Earlier, another Palestinian civilian was killed under similar circumstances by soldiers’ gunfire.

name: Ahmad Hassan 'Ali Jahajhah
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at the entrance to the refugee camp. According to the military’s account of events, the soldiers fired after they suspected he was trying to run them over. Accounts given to B’Tselem by residents indicate that Jahahja was trying to flee the camp, as did others, when he heard of the soldiers’ arrival. Later, another Palestinian civilian was killed under similar circumstances by Border Police gunfire.

name: 'Issa Ibrahim Salamah al-Hrub
notes: Shot dead in his car by Border Police and soldiers who suspected he was trying to run them over.

name: Sami Shawqi Ahmad Madi
notes: Sustained a gunshot wound to the chest at a protest in which stones were thrown at soldiers standing about 300 meters away, on the other side of the perimeter fence.

name: 'Udai Jihad Hussein Irsheid
notes: Killed by Border Police gunfire. Media reports stated that he was shot in the course of clashes.

name: 'Abd a-Rahman Yusri Zakaria Maswdeh
notes: Shot dead by the settlement’s head of security after stabbing a soldier and an Israeli civilian. Media reports stated that the civilian sustained light injuries and the soldier sustained light to moderate injuries.

name: Malek Akram Mahmoud Shahin
notes: Shot in the head by soldiers during clashes with security forces who had entered the refugee camp on an arrest raid.

name: Gennady Kaufman
notes: Stabbed and critically wounded near the Tomb of the Patriarchs. The assailant was shot dead by Border Police.

name: Ihab Fathi Zakaria Maswdeh
notes: Shot dead by Border Police near the Tomb of the Patriarchs after stabbing and critically wounding an Israeli civilian, who then died of his wounds on 30 December 2015.

name: 'Omar Yasser Fakhri Skafi
notes: Shot dead by a soldier he was trying to stab, after having run over two Israeli civilians and stabbed a policeman. The soldier continued firing at Skafi even he had fallen to the ground and no longer posed any danger. According to a statement by the police, the civilians who had been run over and the policemen who had been stabbed sustained light injuries.

name: Taher Feisal 'Abd al-Mun'im Fanun
notes: Shot dead by soldiers after he and his cousin, who was also killed, stabbed a soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the soldier sustained light injuries.

name: Mustafa Fadel 'Abd al-Mun'im Fanun
notes: Shot dead by soldiers after he and his cousin, who was also killed, stabbed a soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the soldier sustained light injuries.

name: 'Abd a-Rahman Wajih Ibrahim 'Abd al-Majid
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot after stabbing a soldier in the neck, inflicting light injuries.

name: Anas Bassam 'Abd a-Rahim Hammad
notes: Shot dead by soldiers after he hit a group of soldiers with his car. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, two of the soldiers sustained light injuries.

name: 'Iz a-Din 'Abdallah Muhammad Raddad
notes: Shot dead by police after stabbing another policeman. According to a statement by the police, the policeman sustained moderate injuries.

name: Mazen Hassan Ahmad 'Ireibah
notes: Palestinian Authority intelligence officer. Shot dead by soldiers after he opened fire and injured a soldier and an Israeli civilian. Media reports stated that the civilian sustained grave injuries and the soldier sustained light injuries.

name: Maram Ramez 'Abed Hasunah
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at Einav Checkpoint when she approached it, knife in hand.

name: Maamun Raed Muhammad al-Khatib
notes: Shot dead near Gush Etzion Junction after stabbing an Israeli civilian. Media reports stated that the Israeli civilian sustained light to moderate injuries.

name: Ayman Samih Hassan al-'Abasi
notes: Killed by Border Police gunfire that hit him in the chest. According to the Israel Police Spokesperson, he was shot during clashes in which Molotov cocktails were lobbed at police officers.

name: Bassim 'Abd a-Rahman Mustafa Salah
notes: Shot by a Border Police officer. According to the Israel Police Spokesperson, was shot dead while trying to stab another officer.

name: 'Omar 'Arafat 'Issa a-Za'aqiq
notes: Shot dead by soldiers after running them over. According to media reports, six soldiers were injured in his attack, two of them sustaining moderate injuries.

name: Fadi Muhammad Mahmoud Khasib
notes: Shot dead by an Israeli civilian. According to the Israel Police Spokesperson, he was shot after he ran over two people waiting at a hitchhiking station, causing them light injuries, then got out of his car and ran at them wielding a knife.

name: Yihya Yusri Hassan Taha
notes: Shot dead by soldiers in clashes that erupted during an arrest mission in the village. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot while trying to lob a Molotov cocktail.

name: Khaled Mahmoud 'Abd al-Majid Jibrin
notes: Critically injured by soldiers’ gunfire while participating in clashes in which stones and Molotov cocktails were lobbed at a military tower. He died of his wounds later that day.

name: Samer Hassan Mbadda Sarisi
notes: Shot dead by Border Police at Za’tara Checkpoint. According to the Israel Police Spokesperson, he was shot running towards police officers at the checkpoint with a knife in hand.

name: Muhammad Isma'il Muhammad a-Shobaki
notes: Critically injured by soldiers’ gunfire after stabbing a soldier. According to media reports, the soldier was gravely injured. The soldiers prevented medics from caring for the Palestinian attacker for about half an hour. He died of his wounds after being taken to hospital.

name: Samah 'Abd al-Mumin Ahmad 'Abdallah
notes: Critically wounded by soldiers’ gunfire as while crossing she passed through a checkpoint in a car, with relatives. According to media reports, the gunfire was targeting a Palestinian youth who was had tried trying to stab Israelis at a nearby hitchhiking station. He, too, was killed. Died of her wounds at a hospital in Israel.

name: Ahmad Jamal Muhammad Taha
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at the gas station on Route 443, after stabbing and critically injuring a soldier, who later died of his wounds.

name: Hadil Wajih 'Abd al-Hamid 'Awwad
notes: Shot dead after she and her cousin attacked a Palestinian passerby with scissors. According to media reports, the man was lightly injured. A police sapper who happened upon the scene shot the two girls several times, even after they were injured and had fallen to the ground. Her cousin was arrested.

name: 'Alaa Khalil Sabah Hashash
notes: Killed by many bullets to the chest and thighs fired at him by soldiers. According to media reports, he was shot while trying to stab Israelis at a hitchhiking station. The gunfire also critically injured a young Palestinian woman who was passing by in a car; she died of her wounds on 16 December 2015 at a hospital in Israel.

name: Shadi Muhammad Mahmoud Khasib
notes: Shot dead by an Israeli civilian. According to the Israel Police Spokesperson, he was shot after trying to run over people waiting at a hitchhiking station, after which he got out of his car and stabbed one of them, injuring him lightly.

name: Ashraqat Taha Ahmad Qatnani
notes: Shot dead as she approached the hitchhiking station near Huwarah Checkpoint with a knife. An Israeli civilian ran her over and then soldiers shot her as she lay wounded on the ground.

name: 'Issam Ahmad Salman Thawabteh
notes: Shot dead by a soldier at Gush Etzion Junction after stabbing an Israeli civilian to death.

name: Hadar Buchris
notes: Stabbed to death at Gush Etzion Junction. The assailant was shot dead by a soldier.

name: Reuven Aviram
notes: Stabbed to death along with another Israeli civilian.

name: Aharon Yesayev
notes: Stabbed to death along with another Israeli civilian.

name: Ya'aKov Don
notes: Shot dead by a Palestinian civilian who opened fire at Israeli vehicles. A Palestinian civilian and a foreign national were also killed by the gunfire. The shooter was shot and injured by security forces and taken into custody.

name: Muhammad Munir Hassan Saleh
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to media reports, the soldiers fired after he shots at them. Two passengers who were in the car with him were arrested.

name: Layth Ashraf 'Ali As'ad
notes: Shot by soldiers during clashes with troops that entered the refugee camp to carry out a punitive home demolition. Soldiers prevented medics from treating him for some 40 minutes. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the shooting was part of an exchange of gunfire with armed Palestinians. Another Palestinian civilian was killed in the clashes.

name: Ahmad Subhi Hussein Abu al-'Eish
notes: Killed by soldiers’ gunfire, sustaining gunshot wounds to the head, back and abdomen during clashes with troops that entered the refugee camp to carry out a punitive home demolition. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the shooting was part of an exchange of gunfire with armed Palestinians. Another Palestinian civilian was killed in the clashes.

name: Natanel Litman
notes: Killed with his father by shots fired at the car in which his family was traveling.

name: Ya'aKov Litman
notes: Killed with his son by shots fired at the car in which his family was traveling.

name: Hassan Jihad Hassan Sa'dah
notes: Critically injured in his back by soldiers’ gunfire during clashes with security forces. At the time, he was holding a Molotov cocktail that had not yet been lit. Died of his wounds later that day, in hospital.

name: Lafy Yusef Mustafa 'Awad
notes: Critically injured when soldiers fired at his back, after he broke free of their grasp and began to flee. He was taken to hospital in a civilian vehicle, which had to take a longer route because of a military checkpoint. He was pronounced dead upon arrival at the hospital.

name: 'Abdallah 'Azzam Sha'ban Shalaldeh
notes: Shot dead at Al-Ahli Hospital by undercover members of an Israeli counter-terrorism unit who entered the hospital to arrest his cousin, who was in hospitalized at the time.

name: Mahmoud Muhammad 'Issa Wadi
notes: Critically wounded in his shoulder and back at a demonstration protesting the killing of ‘Abdallah Shalaldeh at Al-Ahli Hospital in Hebron the day before by undercover members of an Israeli counter-terrorism unit.

name: Ibrahim 'Abd al-Halim Yusef Dawood
notes: Critically wounded by Border Police gunfire at a protest in which Palestinians threw stones at the police.

name: Sadeq Ziad Sadeq Gharbiyah
notes: Shot dead by Border Police at the Container Checkpoint. According to the Israel Police Spokesperson, he had attempted to stab a police officer at the checkpoint.

name: Muhammad 'Abed Musa Nimer
notes: Shot dead by a Jerusalem Light Rail security guard while attempting to stab him.

name: Rasha Muhammad Hamed Rayan
notes: Shot dead at HaPerot (the Fruit) Checkpoint by security guards from the Land Crossings Authority after drawing a knife and not heeding their calls to halt, when she was about 10 meters away from them.

name: Suliman 'Adel Muhammad Shahin
notes: Shot dead by Border Police after he ran over people waiting at a hitchhiking station. According to media reports, four people were run over and injured, including two who were gravely wounded.

name: Salamah Musa Muhammad Abu Jame'
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at a protest near the perimeter fence with Gaza. He was approx. 50 meters away from the fence, throwing stones at soldiers who had taken cover behind a dirt mound on the other side of the fence.

name: Tharwat Ibrahim Suliman a-Sha'rawi
notes: Shot dead by soldiers standing on a road, after they suspected she was trying to run some of them over. The soldiers continued firing at her even after the car passed them.

name: Malek Jalal Muhammad a-Sharif
notes: Shot dead by a soldier at the Gush Etzion Junction. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot after attempting to stab a soldier.

name: Ibrahim Samir Ibrahim Skafi
notes: Shot dead by Border Police after running over one of their officers. The officer was critically injured and died of his wounds on 8 November 2015.

name: Ahmad 'Awad Muhammad Abu a-Rob
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at the gas station by al-Jalameh Checkpoint after pulling a knife on soldiers about to search him.

name: Fadi Hassan 'Issa al-Froukh
notes: Shot dead by Border Police near the entrance to Beit ‘Einun. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he attempted to stab soldiers.

name: Mahmoud Talal Mahmoud Nazzal
notes: Shot dead at Jalameh Checkpoint by a security guard of the Ministry of Defense’s Land Crossings Authority. According to media reports, he was shot in an attempt to stab security guards at the checkpoint.

name: Qassem Mahmoud Qassem Saba'aneh
notes: Hit in the upper body by three bullets fired by a female Border Police officer at Za’tarah Checkpoint. According to a statement by the police, he and another Palestinian rode up to the checkpoint on a motor scooter, holding knives in their hands. They were shot at after they stabbed a Border Police officer. According to the statement, the officer sustained light injuries to his hand.

name: Mahdi Muhammad Ramadan al-Muhtaseb
notes: Injured by gunfire at Checkpoint 160 after he injured a Border Police officer. According to media reports, the officer sustained light injuries. Shot dead by a Border Police officer, as he lay on the ground, posing no danger.

name: Faruk 'Abd al-Qader Muhammad 'Omar Sidr
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to media reports, he was shot attempting to stab the soldiers.

name: Islam Rafiq Hammad 'Abido
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot attempting to stab the soldiers.

name: Shadi Nabil 'Abd al-Mu'ti al-Qudsi
notes: He and another Palestinian were shot dead while the two were assaulting a soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the soldier sustained light injuries.

name: 'Iz a-Din Nadi Sha'ban Abu Shakhdam
notes: He and another Palestinian were shot dead while the two were assaulting a soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the soldier sustained light injuries.

name: Humam 'Adnan Yihya Is'id
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to the IDF Spokesperson, he was trying to stab soldiers.

name: Raed Saket 'Abd a-Rahim Thalji (Jaradat)
notes: Shot by soldiers after stabbing a soldier. The soldiers continued firing at him even once he was lying motionless on the ground. Media reports state that the soldiers sustained severe injuries.

name: Sa'ed Muhammad Yusef al-Atrash
notes: Shot dead by soldiers. According to media reports, he was shot attempting to stab the soldiers. B’Tselem’s inquiry found that, for about 30 minutes after he was wounded, he lay on the ground without being given any medical treatment.

name: Iyad Rohi Hijazi Jaradat
notes: Shot dead by soldiers during clashes between Palestinian youths and Israeli security forces.

name: Daniyah Jihad Hussein Irsheid
notes: Shot dead by Border Police at the Patriarchs’ Tomb Checkpoint. Reports in the media quoted the police stating that Irsheid had tried to stab police officers, yet B’Tselem’s inquiries indicate that she was shot with her hands raised in the air in compliance with the demand of police officers at the checkpoint.

name: Ahmad Muhammad Sa'id Kamil
notes: Shot dead at Jalameh Checkpoint by a security guard of the Ministry of Defense’s Land Crossings Authority in an attempt to stab security guards at the checkpoint.

name: Mahmoud Khaled Mahmoud Ghneimat
notes: Shot dead by police after he and another Palestinian assaulted an Israeli civilian with a knife. Media reports stated that the Israeli sustained moderate wounds.

name: Mu'taz 'Atallah Ibrahim Qassem
notes: Killed by eight live rounds a female soldier fired at his upper body after he stabbed another female solder. Media reports state that the soldier was critically injured.

name: Hamzah Musa Muhammad al-'Amleh
notes: Shot dead by a soldier after hitting a soldier and an Israeli civilian with his car. He then got out of the vehicle armed with a knife. Media resorts state that the solider and civilian he hit sustained light injuries.

name: 'Udai Hashem Muhammad Masalmeh
notes: Shot by soldiers after he stabbed an IDF officer. According to the IDF Spokesperson’s statement, the officer sustained light injuries.

name: Ahmad Sharif al-'Abed a-Sarhi
notes: Killed while in the company of other armed military branch operatives approximately 300 meters from the perimeter fence.

name: Bashar Nidal Jamil al-Ja'bari
notes: Shot dead with his cousin after they underwent inspection at the checkpoint of the a-Rajabi Building and then headed with a soldier to the area behind the building. According to media reports, they tried to stab the soldier, causing his very light injuries.

name: Husam Isma'il Jamil al-Ja'bari
notes: Shot dead with his cousin after they underwent inspection at the checkpoint of the a-Rajabi Building and then headed with a soldier to the area behind the building. According to media reports, they tried to stab the soldier, causing his very light injuries.

name: Avraham Hasno
notes: Killed when he was run over by a Palestinian truck driver after getting out of his car and attacking Palestinian vehicles with a club, after Palestinians had thrown stones at his car.

name: Fadel Muhammad 'Awad al-Qawasmi
notes: Shot dead by an Israeli civilian. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, he was shot while attempting to stab the civilian.

name: 'Omar Muhammad Mahmoud al-Faqih
notes: According to a statement by the Israel Police, he arrived at Qalandia Checkpoint and stabbed a police officer who was wearing a protective vest and was not injured. Other police officers shot and injured him. When he was lying wounded on the ground, a police bomb sapper approached him to search his person. Al-Faqih tried to stab the sapper and was shot dead by a gunshot to the head by a Border Police officer.

name: Mu'taz Ahmad Hajes 'Alian
notes: Shot dead by Border Police officers. According to a statement by the Israel Police, he was shot in the course of an attempt to stab one of the officers. The incident took place in the neighborhood of Armon Hanatziv, in dead man’s land between Israel and the West Bank.

name: Tareq Ziad Nu'man a-Natsheh
notes: Shot dead by soldiers at the Police (Shoter) Checkpoint after stabbing another soldier. According to a statement by the IDF Spokesperson, the soldier sustained light injuries.

name: Bayan Ayman 'Abd al-Wahab 'Asilah
notes: Killed by shots fired by the female Border Police officer she stabbed at Checkpoint 160. Media reports state that the officer sustained light injuries to her hand.

name: Yihya Hashem Nimer Karirah
notes: Mortally wounded by a gunshot wound to the head at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Another protester was killed at the demonstration.

name: Mahmoud Hatem Muhammad Hamid
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the neck during a protest near the perimeter fence. Another protester was killed in the incident.

name: Yihya 'Abd al-Qader Jaber Farhat
notes: Killed during a protest near Erez Checkpoint.

name: Ihab Jihad Yusef Hanani
notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers after he threw stones at them during clashes.

name: Iyad Khalil Mahmoud al-'Awawdeh
notes: Shot by soldiers after he disguised himself as a journalist and stabbed a soldier. He fell to the ground, and the soldiers fired at him again when he lay motionless on the ground. Media reports state that the soldier sustained moderate injuries.

name: Basel Bassam Ragheb Sidr
notes: Shot by Border Police officers at Damascus Gate. Officers continued firing at him even after he had fallen and was lying on the ground, apparently having been hit, and was no longer posing any danger.

name: Ahmad Fathi Muhammad Abu Sh'aban
notes: Fatally shot by a Special Patrol Unit officer after stabbing a 70-year-old Israeli citizen who, according to the police, sustained moderate to serious injuries. Video footage released by Israeli media shows an officer shooting Abu Sh’aban as he lies on the ground.

name: Alon Govberg
notes: Killed by two Palestinians who stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus. Another Israeli was killed during the attack, and a third succumbed to injuries on 27 October 2015. One of the assailants was killed by police gunfire.

name: Yeshayahu Krishevsky
notes: Stabbed to death by a Palestinian, right after the latter ran over people waiting at a bus station. The assailant was shot dead by passersby. Media reports stated that three Israelis were also injured in the assault, two sustaining moderate wounds.

name: Richard Lakin
notes: Mortally wounded by two Palestinians who stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus. Two other Israelis were killed in the attack. One of the assailants was killed by police gunfire.

name: Bahaa Muhammad Khalil 'Alian
notes: Shot dead by police after he and another Palestinian stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus, killing two Israeli civilians. Another Israeli civilian injured in the assault succumbed to his wounds on 27 October 2015.

name: Mu'taz Ibrahim Hamdan Zawahreh
notes: Shot dead by soldiers when poised to lob a Molotov cocktail at them during clashes near Rachel’s Tomb.

name: 'Alaa Dawood 'Ali Abu Jamal
notes: Shot dead by passersby after he ran over people waiting at a bus stop and then stabbed an Israeli civilian to death. According to media reports, another three Israeli civilians were also injured in the assault, two sustaining moderate wounds.

name: Haviv Haim
notes: Killed by two Palestinians who stabbed and fired at passengers on a bus. Another Israeli was killed during the attack, and a third succumbed to injuries on 27 October 2015. One of the assailants was killed by police gunfire.

name: Muhammad Nazmi Muhammad a-Sheikh
notes: Shot dead by a police officer stabbing a soldier and snatching the weapon of another police officer. According to a statement by the Israel Police, the soldier sustained light wounds.

name: Mustafa 'Adel Baker al-Khatib
notes: Fatally shot in the back by police officers near Damascus Gate while trying to flee from them. According to the police, he was shot after stabbing an officer who was wearing a protective vest and was not injured in the attack.

name: Hassan Khaled Jebril Mahani
notes: Shot dead by police after he and a Palestinian minor stabbed two Israeli civilians, one of whom was a minor. According to a statement by the Israel Police, the adult Israeli who was stabbed sustained severe injuries and the Israeli minor was critically wounded.

name: Khalil Hassan Khalil Abu 'Obeid
notes: Mortally wounded when hit by a tear-gas grenade that penetrated his body at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers.

name: Rahaf Yihya Sa'di Hassan
notes: Killed along with her mother when their home was bombed.

name: Nur Rasmi Muhammad Hassan
notes: Killed along with her three-year-old daughter when their home was bombed.

name: Muhammad Sa'id 'Abd al-Karim Muhammad 'Ali
notes: Shot dead by police officers near Damascus Gate after stabbing two other police officers. Media reports stated that the police officers sustained light and moderate injuries.

name: Khalil 'Omar Musa 'Othman
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the chest at a protest near the perimeter fence. Another protester was killed in the incident.

name: Marwan Hisham Na'im Barbakh
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the chest at a protest near the perimeter fence. Another protester was killed in the incident.

name: Ishaq Qassem Ishaq Badran
notes: Shot dead by police after stabbing two Israeli civilians. According to a statement by the Israel Police, the two Israelis sustained light injuries.

name: Ahmad Jamal Ahmad Salah
notes: Shot dead by police during clashes. The Israel Police says he was shot after he fired at the police officers.

name: Hamuda Hisham Muhammad Muhsein (a-Raqab)
notes: Shot dead at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Another protester was killed in the incident, and a third succumbed to his wounds the following day.

name: 'Abd al-Majid Majdi 'Abd al-Majid al-Wahidi
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the neck at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Three other protesters were killed along with him.

name: Ahmad Yihya Mahmoud al-Hirbawi
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the stomach at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Three other protesters were killed along with him.

name: Shadi Husam a-Din Muthaffar Dawlah
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the stomach at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Three other protesters were killed along with him.

name: 'Adnan Musa Ahmad Abu 'Alayan
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the head, at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Another protester was killed in the incident, and a third succumbed to his wounds the following day.

name: Jihad Zayed Salem A'beid
notes: Mortally wounded during a protest near the perimeter fence at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Two other protesters were also killed in the incident.

name: Ziad Nabil Ziad Sharaf
notes: Killed after sustaining a gunshot wound to the chest, at a demonstration near the perimeter fence. During the demonstration, protesters threw stones at soldiers. Three other protesters were killed along with him.

name: Muhammad Fares 'Abdallah al-Ja'bari
notes: Shot dead by a police officer after stabbing another officer. Media reports sate that the police officer sustained light injuries.

name: Ibrahim Ahmad Mustafa 'Awad
notes: Sustained a mortal head injury from soldiers’ gunfire, after he and other young men threw stones at the soldiers.

name: Wisam Jamal Taleb Faraj
notes: Shot dead by Border Police when he threw stones at them from a roof in the course of a gunfight between Israeli security forces and Palestinians.

name: Thaer 'Abd a-Salam Khader Abu Ghazalah
notes: Shot dead by an IDF officer after stabbing a female soldier and four Israeli civilians, then fleeing the scene. Media reports stated that the soldier and the civilians sustained light wounds.

name: Amjad Hatem Mahmoud Hushiyeh
notes: Shot dead by police after stabbing a soldier, snatching his weapon, and holed up in an apartment. Media reports stated that the soldier sustained light wounds.

name: 'Abd a-Rahman Shadi Khalil 'Obeidallah
notes: Shot dead by soldiers as he stood with other teenagers approx. 200 meters from a military post by Rachel’s Tomb. At the time, minor clashes between Palestinians and soldiers were underway there.

name: Huzaifah 'Othman Rajeh Suliman
notes: Sustained mortal wounds from soldiers’ gunfire during clashes near the Tulkarm Factories Checkpoint. He was pronounced dead in hospital.

name: Fadi Samir Mustafa 'Allon
notes: Shot dead by a police patrol officer who fired seven bullets at him, apparently after he stabbed an Israeli teenaged boy. He fell down and was on the ground after the first shot, from which point he posed no danger. According to media reports, the Israeli boy stabbed sustained moderate wounds.

name: Muhannad Shafiq Muhammad Halabi
notes: Shot dead by police after assaulting a family on its way to the Western Wall with a knife, killing the father of the family – a soldier on leave – and a civilian who came to the family’s aid.

name: Nehemia Lavi
notes: Stabbed to death when he came to the aid of a family attacked on its way to the Western Wall. The father of the family was also killed in the incident. The assailant was shot dead by police.

name: Na'ama Henkin
notes: Killed with her husband in a drive-by shooting.

name: Eitam Henkin
notes: Killed with his wife in a drive-by shooting.

name: Hadil Salah a-Din Sadeq al-Hashlamun
notes: Fatally wounded by soldiers’ gunfire at the Police (Shoter) Checkpoint, while carrying a concealed knife on her person. Soldiers called for her stop as she was on her way out of the checkpoint, fired at her legs, then immediately fired at her upper body. She died of her wounds later the same day.

name: Ahmad 'Izat 'Issa Khatatbeh
notes: Congenitally deaf. Fatally wounded in the back of his body by soldiers’ gunfire near Beit Furik Checkpoint.

name: Alexander Levlovich
notes: Killed after a stone a Palestinian threw at his car went into the car, causing him to lose control of the car, which hit an electric pole and a tree. Levlovich sustained injuries to the chest and heart. A female passenger in the car was injured.

name: Muhammad Bassam Mustafa 'Amshah
notes: Killed by gunshots to the torso fired by Border Police officers. The Police say he was shot after he stabbed and slightly injured a Border Police officer.

name: Rafiq Kamel Rafiq a-Taj
notes: Shot to death by Border Police officers. The Police say he was shot after he stabbed a Border Police officer in the back, slightly injuring him.

name: Anas Ibrahim Muhammad Taha
notes: Shot to death by soldiers who arrived on the scene after he stabbed and wounded an Israeli civilian at a gas station on Route 443.

name: 'Ali Sa'ed Muhammad Dawabsheh
notes: Killed when his house was torched. His parents and brother were seriously wounded in the fire. His father died of his wounds on 8 August 2015 and his mother succumbed on 7 September 2015. Hate graffiti in Hebrew was spray painted near his home.

name: Sa'ed Muhammad Hassan Dawabsheh
notes: Fatally wounded when his house was torched. His 18-month-old son was burnt to death and his wife and young son seriously wounded. His wife died of her wounds on 7 September 2015. Hate graffiti in Hebrew was spray painted near his home.

name: Riham Hussein Hassan Dawabsheh
notes: Fatally wounded when her house was torched. Her 18-month-old son was burnt to death. Her husband was fatally wounded and died of his wounds on 8 August 2015. Another young son was seriously wounded. Hate graffiti in Hebrew was spray painted near her home.

name: Layth Fadel 'Issa al-Khaledi
notes: Fatally wounded when a soldier shot him in the back after he and other youths threw Molotov cocktails and paint bottles at a military checkpoint. Died in hospital the next day.

name: Muhammad Hamed 'Adel al-Masri
notes: Fatally wounded by gunshots fired by soldiers near the border fence. Pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital shortly thereafter. Prior to the shooting al-Masri attempted to break a military surveillance camera mounted on the fence.

name: Muhammad 'Ata Diab Abu Latifah
notes: Died after being shot in the thighs as he was fleeing security forces who had come to arrest him.

name: Fallah Hamdi Zamel Abu Maryah
notes: Killed after soldiers entered his home to make an arrest, and shot and wounded his son. Abu Mariyah threw pottery at the soldiers from a balcony on the second floor of his home and the soldiers shot him three times in the chest.

name: Muhammad Ahmad Mahmoud 'Alawneh
notes: Fatally wounded by gunshots fired by security forces while he and other youths were throwing stones at a military force that entered Birqin to make arrests. Died of his wounds several hours later at a hospital in Jenin. B’Tselem’s investigation precludes the IDF Spokesperson’s account that the youths had thrown Molotov cocktails at the unit.

name: Muhammad Sami 'Ali 'Ali Kusbah
notes: Shot three times by the Binyamin Brigade commander as he was fleeing, after he threw a large rock at the windshield of the military vehicle in which the brigade commander was riding.

name: Malachi Rosenfeld
notes: Shot and mortally wounded on Alon Road in drive-by shooting. Died of his injuries the next day.

name: Hammad Jum'ah 'Ata Rumanin
notes: Shot and killed by soldiers at al-Hamra Checkpoint (Be’qaot) after he fired at the soldiers.

name: Danny Gonen
notes: Shot and mortally wounded by Palestinian gunfire. Died of his injuries in hospital.

name: 'Iz a-Din Walid Hassan Bani Gharrah
notes: Shot by Border Police officers who entered the R.C. to make an arrest. The Police said he lobbed an improvised bomb at the officers before being shot.

name: 'Umran 'Omar Muhammad Abu Dheim
notes: Shot to death by a Border Police officer after hitting and wounding two other Border Police officers with his car.

name: Muhammad Murad Saleh Yihya
notes: Shot and fatally injured by soldiers near an agricultural gate set in the Separation Barrier, a spot he had come to with other young men. Clashes ensued there, between a military patrol and the young men who threw stones at the patrol. Died of his injuries on 28 April 2015.

name: 'Ali Muhammad 'Ali Abu Ghannam
notes: Shot by Border Police in the torso and mortally wounded after attempting to stab a Border Police officer at a checkpoint. Died of his injuries later that day.

name: Mahmoud Yihya Yunes Abu Jheishah
notes: Shot to death by Border Police after he stabbed a Border Police officer at the Tomb of the Patriarchs - West Checkpoint.

name: Shalom Yohai Sherki
notes: Critically injured in a ramming attack carried out by a Palestinian at the French Hill junction. Died of his injuries on 16 April 2015. An Israeli woman was also injured in the attack.

name: Ziad 'Omar Musleh 'Awad
notes: Shot to death by soldiers who had stationed an ambush in the village of Beit Ummar while a funeral was underway there. Clashes with Israeli security forces, including throwing stones and Molotov cocktails, occurred during the course of the funeral.

name: Muhammad Jasser Ibrahim Karakrah
notes: According to the IDF Spokesperson, he stabbed and wounded two soldiers, one of whom then fatally shot him.

name: 'Ali Mahmoud 'Abd a-Rahman Safi
notes: Gravely wounded on 18 March 2015 by shots fired by a soldier in the course of a demonstration and clashes near the settlement of Beit El. Died of his injuries on 25 March 2015.

name: Tawfiq Sa'id Muhammad Abu Ryalah
notes: Shot from a navy ship in the zone permitted to Gaza fishermen by the military.

name: Jihad Shihadah 'Abdallah al-J'afri
notes: Shot by soldiers in the chest while he was throwing stones from a third-story roof in the course of clashes that erupted when the troops entered the refugee camp to make an arrest.

name: Ahmad Ibrahim Jaber Abu al-'Azzah
notes: Sustained gunshot wound to the head from gunfire soldiers fired from ambush, while he throwing a Molotov cocktail at cars on Route 60.

name: Ousamah Muhammad 'Ali Jundiyah
notes: Killed by a soldier's gunfire near the Gush Etzion junction. According to media reports, he was shot when fleeing police officers who were staking out car thieves at the supermarket parking lot.

name: Imam Jamil Ahmad Dweikat
notes: Shot in the back by a soldier stationed in an ambush near Route 505, where Dwiekat had apparently gone to throw stones.

name: Taysir Yusef Muslem a-Smeiri
notes: Killed outside his home, located approximately 500 meters away from the Gaza perimeter fence. Approximately an hour before he was killed, a soldier was wounded by shots fired by armed militants who were near the town of Khuza'a, located more than 7 kilometers away from al-Qarara. After the soldier was wounded, the military fired at the Gaza perimeter fence area, hitting a-Sameiri.

name: Mahmoud 'Abdallah Muhammad Dar 'Udwan
notes: Shot in the head by soldiers from an undercover unit during clashes that erupted in the refugee camp after troops who had entered the camp to make an arrest were discovered. According to the military, Dar ‘Udwan threw an improvised bomb at the troops before he was shot. B’Tselem’s findings cast doubt on this claim.

name: Fadel Muhammad Muhammad Halawah
notes: Shot in the back by soldiers while he and another man were out bird-hunting with nets, approximately 20 meters west of the Gaza perimeter fence.

name: Haim Yehiel Rotman
notes: Fatally wounded by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Four other worshipers were killed in the incident. In exchanges of fire during the incident a police officer was killed by gunfire whose source is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

name: Avraham Shmuel Goldberg
notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

name: Arye Kupinsky
notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

name: Moshe Twersky
notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

name: Kalman Ze'ev Levine
notes: Killed by gunfire and stab wounds inflicted by two Palestinians who assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. Three other worshipers were also killed at the same time. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. A police officer was killed in exchanges of fire between the assailants and police, but the source of his gunshot wounds is not yet known. The two assailants were killed by police gunfire.

name: Ghassan Muhammad 'Ali Abu Jamal
notes: Member of the military wing of the Popular Front. Killed by police gunfire after he and another man, who was killed as well, assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. The two assailants fired at and stabbed worshipers, killing four. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. In exchanges of fire during the incident a police officer was killed by gunfire whose source is not yet known.

name: 'Udai 'Abed 'Ali Abu Jamal
notes: Member of the military wing of the Popular Front. Killed by police gunfire after he and another man, who was killed as well, assaulted worshipers at a synagogue in Har Nof, Jerusalem. The two assailants fired at and stabbed worshipers, killing four. A fifth worshiper succumbed to his wounds on 24 October 2015. In exchanges of fire during the incident a police officer was killed by gunfire whose source is not yet known.

name: Muhammad 'Imad Ahmad Jawabreh
notes: Shot in the chest through the window of his home by soldiers standing on the roof of another home in the camp. The military alleges that the soldiers felt they were in danger when he pointed an improvised gun at them B’Tselem’s findings ruled out the allegation.

name: Dalia Lemkus
notes: Stabbed to death by a Palestinian. He had first used his car to hit her and other people waiting at a bus station at the junction at the entrance to Alon Shvut, Bethlehem District.

name: Shalom Aharon Ba'adani
notes: Injured in a car attack at the Sheikh Jarah light rail station. Died of his wounds on 7 November 2014. Another Border Police officer killed in the attack. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot to death when, wielding a metal rod, he assaulted police cars.

name: Ibrahim Muhammad Dawood 'Akari
notes: Shot to death by a Border Police officer when, wielding a metal rod, he assaulted police cars after having just perpetrated a car attack at the Sheikh Jarah light rail station. He had hit pedestrians with his car, killing a Border Police officer. An Israeli minor injured in the attack died of his wounds on 7 November 2014.

name: Mu'taz Ibrahim Khalil Hijazi
notes: Shot by members of the Yamam, Border Police counter-terrorism unit, during an operation to arrest him for allegedly firing at Yehuda Glick, an Israeli Israeli activist who promoted allowing Jewish worship on the Temple Mount. He was armed with a handgun and the police say he fired at the police officers before he was shot.

name: 'Urwah 'Abd al-Wahab Abd al-Ghani Khaleq
notes: Shot by soldiers when he tried to throw a Molotov cocktail at a car on Route 60.

name: Chaya Zissel Braun
notes: Killed in a car attack at the light rail station at Ammunition Hill, Jerusalem. Another woman who was injured in the attack died of her injuries on 26 October 2014. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot after he fled his car and died of his injuries later that day.

name: 'Abd a-Rahman Idris Muhammd Yihya a-Shaloudi
notes: Shot by a police officer after he ran from his car subsequent to perpetrating a car attack at the light rail station at Ammunition Hill, Jerusalem. Died of his injuries later that day. In the attack a 3-month-old baby girl was killed and another woman wounded in the attack died of her injuries on 26 October 2014.

name: Karen Jemima Musquera
notes: Injured in a car attack at the light rail station at Ammunition Hill, Jerusalem. Died of her injuries on 26 October 2014. A 3-month old baby girl was also killed in the attack. The driver who perpetrated the attack was shot after he fled his car and died of his injuries later that day.

name: Bahaa a-Din Samir Musa Bader
notes: Shot by soldiers in clashes between locals and soldiers that erupted when the latter arrived at the village to subpoena a resident of the village. The IDF Spokesman stated that the shots were fired after he threw a Molotov cocktail at the troops.

name: 'Amer 'Omar 'Abd al-Qader Abu 'Eishah
notes: Fatally shot in in a gunfight with Israeli security forces who came to arrest him on suspicion of the abduction and killing of three Israeli yeshiva students, two of them minors, in June. Was an operative of the Hamas military branch. Another Hamas military branch operative was also killed in this incident.

name: Marwan Sa'di 'Abd al-'Afo al-Qawasmeh
notes: Fatally shot in in a gunfight with Israeli security forces who came to arrest him on suspicion of the abduction and killing of three Israeli yeshiva students, two of them minors, in June. Was an operative of the Hamas military branch. Another Hamas military branch operative was also killed in this incident.

name: 'Issa Khaled 'Issa Qatri
notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers who came to the refugee camp to make an arrest. He was standing with a group of youths watching the troops’ actions. The military alleges that he was shot when he tried to lob a pipe-bomb at the soldiers.

name: Muhammad 'Abd al-Hamid Ibrahim Sinuqrut
notes: Sustained a fatal head wound from a sponge round police fired at him on 31 August 2014. Died of his wounds on 4 September 2014.

name: Yihya Farhan Ahmad Abu Jaber
notes: Injured driving a taxi on Salah a-Din Street. His son, who was in the taxi with him, sustained moderate injuries.

name: Tamer Midhat Hassan Hamad
notes: An electric company employee. Killed together with another worker while they were traveling in a company vehicle displaying the company flag. Three passersby were injured in the strike.

name: Muhammad 'Abd a-Rahman 'Abd al-Qader Daher
notes: An electric company employee. Killed together with another worker while they were traveling in a company vehicle displaying the company flag. Three passersby were injured in the strike.

name: Muhammad Husam Ahmad al-Barim
notes: Killed together with his brother as they walked along the street by a missile fired at a passing motorbike.

name: 'Omar Husam Ahmad al-Barim
notes: Killed together with his brother as they walked along the street by a missile fired at a passing motorbike.

name: Shadi Suliman 'Ali 'Aleiwa
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad when riding a motorcycle in the a-Sha'af neighborhood.

name: Salem 'Abd al-Hamid Diab Muhmmadein
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad when riding a motorcycle in the a-Sha'af neighborhood.

name: Muhammad Saleh Mahmoud a-Riyati
notes: Killed with two other Islamic Jihad military branch operatives near the Yusef a-Najar Hospital.

name: Yusef Subhi Yusef Swelem (Ghanam)
notes: Killed with two other Islamic Jihad military branch operatives near the Yusef a-Najar Hospital.

name: Hassan 'Omar Khalil al-Khawas
notes: Killed with another Hamas armed wing operative near their homes on a-Nafak St.

name: Muhammad Mu'in Radwan Abu 'Ajwah
notes: Killed with another Hamas armed wing operative near their homes on a-Nafak St.

name: Muhammad Majdi Muhammad a-Shawish
notes: Killed on al-Qarman. Two other military branch operatives were injured.

name: Shahar Melamed
notes: Killed by a mortar shell in Kibbutz Nirim. He was deputy-security coordinator for the kibbutz. The mortar shell also killed the chief security coordinator.

name: Ze'ev Etzion
notes: Killed by a mortar shell in Kibbutz Nirim. He was chief security coordinator for the kibbutz. The mortar shell also killed the deputy-security coordinator.

name: Ahmad Kamel 'Abd al-Karim Jarbo'a
notes: Killed with two other Islamic Jihad military branch operatives near the Yusef a-Najar Hospital.

name: Bassem 'Abed 'Odeh 'Ajur
notes: Wounded in his home in the neighborhood of a-Daraj in the strike in which his son was killed.

name: Amneh Raddad Ahmad Tanburah
notes: Killed with her father and brother when their home was bombed after the father entered the sewage pipe tunnel close to the home to repair a fault. Nine other members of the family were injured.

name: Raddad Ahmad Salim Tanburah
notes: An employee of the municipal water department. Entered the sewage pipe tunnel close to his home to repair a fault. The house was bombed and he was killed with two of his children. Nine other members of the family were injured.

name: Farhanah Ibrahim Taleb al-'Attar
notes: Killed when she returned to her home, which she had evacuated earlier, in order to take clothes.

name: Ahmad Raddad Ahmad Tanburah
notes: Killed with his father and sister when their home was bombed after the father entered the sewage pipe tunnel close to the home to repair a fault. Nine other members of the family were injured.

name: Sa'ed Bassem 'Abed 'Ajur
notes: Killed in his home in the neighborhood of a-Daraj. His father was wounded, and died about a week later

name: Ousamah Hamdi 'Abd a-Latif a-Shalfouh
notes: Killed when he went with another Hamas military branch operative to examine the damage their homes sustained.

name: Ahmad Hassan Salem Hijazi
notes: Killed with three other people, one of them a Saudi national, while riding in a car on a-Sahabeh Street.

name: Ahmad Taysir Fahmi a-Dali
notes: Killed with three other people, one of them a Saudi national, while riding in a car on a-Sahabeh Street.

name: Bassem Hassan Salem Hijazi
notes: Killed with three other people, one of them a Saudi national, while riding in a car on a-Sahabeh Street.

name: Ousamah Muhammad Sa'id Shbeir
notes: Killed when he went with another Hamas military branch operative to examine the damage their homes sustained.

name: Muhammad Tal'at Zaki al-Ghul
notes: Killed while riding in his car near the Falastin stadium in a-Nisr neighborhood.

name: Raghad 'Issam Mustafa Judah
notes: Killed with her mother, two brothers and a sister in the yard of their home in the Tel a-Za’tar neighborhood.

name: Muhammad 'Issam Mustafa Judah
notes: Killed with his mother, a brother and two sisters in the yard of their home in the Tel a-Za’tar neighborhood.

name: Ousamah 'Issam Mustafa Judah
notes: Killed with his mother, a brother and two of sisters in the yard of their home in the Tel a-Za’tar neighborhood.

name: Rawyah Ibrahim Muhammad Judah
notes: Killed with two of her daughters and two of her sons in the yard of their home in the Tel a-Za’tar neighborhood.

name: Muhammad Ibrahim Muhammad a-Luqah
notes: Killed riding a motorbike in the al-‘Atatrah neighborhood.

name: Tasnim 'Issam Mustafa Judah
notes: Killed with her mother, two brothers and a sister in the yard of their home in the Tel a-Za’tar neighborhood.

name: Yasin Ibrahim Yasin al-Baltaji
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Hamas while walking on the street in a-Nisr neighborhood.

name: Yihya Mu'in Rushdi Abu Daqen
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Hamas while walking on the street in a-Nisr neighborhood.

name: Adam Ahmad Muhammad Khatab
notes: Killed with another Islamic Jihad military branch operative when there in a home under construction owned by the Abu Samrah family.

name: Mahmoud Ahmad Jum'ah al-'Attar
notes: Killed with another Islamic Jihad military branch operative when there in a home under construction owned by the Abu Samrah family.

name: Muhammad Wael 'Abd a-Rahman al-Khudari
notes: Killed on the porch of his home. At the entrance to the neighboring house, a one-year-old baby girl seated in a swing her home was killed.

name: Yihya 'Omar Ibrahim Abu al-'Imrin
notes: Killed together with another operative of the armed wing of Hamas while riding a motorcycle in the a-Nisr neighborhood. Another operative in the armed wing of Hamas who was walking on the street died of his wounds a month later.

name: Badr a-Din Hashem 'Amer Abu Mani'
notes: Killed together with another operative of the armed wing of Hamas while riding a motorcycle in the a-Nisr neighborhood. Another operative in the armed wing of Hamas who was walking on the street died of his wounds a month later.

name: Muhammad Khalil 'Omar al-Ma'suwabi
notes: Injured in the a-Nisr neighborhood from missile fired at two operatives in the armed wing of Hamas who were passing by on a motorcycle and were killed in the strike.

name: Zeinah Bilal Sabri Abu Taqiyah
notes: Killed seated in a swing at the entrance to her home. A 16-year-old boy was killed on the porch of the neighboring house.

name: Nidal Soheil Hamdan Badawi
notes: Injured walking on Sadam Hussein Street.

name: Mahmoud Ousamah Mahmoud Abu al-'Imrin
notes: Killed while riding in his car in a-Nisr neighborhood.

name: Muhammad Saber Faraj al-'Ajleh
notes: Intellectually disabled. Killed when he left his home in the a-Shuja'yah neighborhood.

name: Nisreen Ibrahim Isma'il Ahmad
notes: Killed at home with her seven-year-old son, a twin, in the bombing of an adjacent four-story building that had been evacuated. Her seven-year-old daughter was injured. A young woman who had returned to the evacuated building to pick up an item was also killed.

name: Hussein Khaled Hussein Ahmad
notes: Killed at home with his mother in the bombing of an adjacent four-story building that had been evacuated. His twin sister was injured. A young woman who had returned to the evacuated building to pick up an item was also killed.

name: Suhair 'Abd al-Karim Hamad Abu Madyan
notes: Killed when she went to pick up an item from her apartment in a building that had been evacuated, and the building was then bombed. In an adjacent building, a mother and her seven-year-old son were killed, and the boy’s twin sister injured.

name: Daniel Tragerman
notes: Killed by shrapnel from a mortar shell that landed near his home.

name: Hayel Shehdeh 'Abd Rabo Abu Dahruj
notes: Killed with his wife and two children when his home and that of his father were bombed. His aunt, who lived in a nearby home, was also killed.

name: Yasin Hamed Jebril Abu Hamad
notes: Killed on the a-Tawil family’s farm. The guard on the farm was also killed.

name: 'Abdallah Hayel Shehdeh Abu Dahruj
notes: Killed with his parents and brother when their home and that of his grandfather were bombed. His father’s aunt, who lived in a nearby home, was also killed.

name: Huda Muhammad Khamis Abu Dahruj
notes: Killed with her husband and two children when thier home and that of her father-in-law were bombed. Her husband’s aunt, who lived in a nearby home, was also killed.

name: Hadi Hayel Shehdeh Abu Dahruj
notes: Killed with his parents and brother when their home and that of his grandfather were bombed. His father’s aunt, who lived in a nearby home, was also killed.

name: Hayat 'Abd Rabo Suliman Abu Dahruj
notes: Killed while asleep at home, when the nearby homes of her brother and nephew were bombed. Her nephew, his wife and their two children were also killed in the bombing.

name: Isma'il Muslem Hamad Abu Bteihan
notes: Killed while sitting under the shade of a tree opposite his home. Four hours later his home was bombarded and completely destroyed.

name: Ibrahim Rashed Ahmad Barakah
notes: Killed by his home in the al-Bruk neighborhood. Three other people were injured in the strike.

name: Mahmoud Naser Mansur Qashlan
notes: A guard on a farm, killed in his place of work. An operative in an armed wing of a Salafite organiztion was also killed in the strike.

name: 'Abd a-Rahman Sa'ed Muhammad Shaluf
notes: Killed on farmland in the a-Shokah area.

name: Hassan Hazem 'Abd al-Hamid 'Ashur
notes: Shot in the abdomen by security forces in a demonstration to protest the military’s actions in Operation Protective Edge. Died of his wounds on 25 August 2014.

name: Ahmad Qassem Musa al-'Abadleh
notes: Injured at home with his two sons. He and one son died in hospital of their injuries.

name: Musa Ahmad Qassem al-'Abadleh
notes: Killed together with his father in his home. His brother was injured in the strike.

name: Hassan Srur Muhammad Tamburah
notes: Killed together with his father while waiting for a taxi to take them to the market in Jabalya.

name: Muhammad Ziad 'Abed a-Rifi
notes: Killed with four members of his family on their farmland. Two other family members succumbed to their wounds several days later. Five children under the age of nine were killed in the incident. Another member of the family, a nine-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs. He remained on life support at hospital after the injury, and died about four and a half years later.

name: 'Abdallah Tareq Ziad a-Rifi
notes: Injured by a missile that killed five members of his family while they were on their farmland. Two other members of his family were hit by the missile: one died of his injuries several days later; another, a 9-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs and was kept on life support in hospital, until he succumbed to his injuries some four and a half years later.

name: Naser Ziad 'Abed a-Rifi
notes: Killed with four members of his family on their farmland. Two other family members succumbed to their wounds several days later. Five children under the age of nine were killed in the incident. Another member of the family, a nine-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs. He remained on life support at hospital after the injury, and died about four and a half years later.

name: Srur Muhammad Jamil Tamburah
notes: Killed together with his son while waiting for a taxi to take them to the market in Jabalya.

name: 'Omar Taysir Ibrahim Abu Nada
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad near the a-Nuseirat towers.

name: Marwan Muhammad Ibrahim Shaluf
notes: Killed along with another person while they were riding a motorbike.

name: Ibrahim 'Issam 'Eid Hammad
notes: Killed along with another person while they were riding a motorbike.

name: 'Issam Muhammad Mahmoud al-Husni
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Hamas while driving on a-Nisr Street in the a-Radwan neighborhood.

name: Muhammad Ahmad Muhammad A'bbas
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Hamas while driving on a-Nisr Street in the a-Radwan neighborhood.

name: Ahmad Tareq Ziad a-Rifi
notes: Killed with four members of his family on their farmland. Two other family members succumbed to their wounds several days later. Five children under the age of nine were killed in the incident. Another member of the family, a nine-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs. He remained on life support at hospital after the injury, and died about four and a half years later.

name: Maram Tareq Ziad a-Rifi
notes: Killed with four members of her family on their farmland. Two other family members succumbed to their wounds several days later. Five children under the age of nine were killed in the incident. Another member of the family, a nine-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs. He remained on life support at hospital after the injury, and died about four and a half years later.

name: Salem Isma'il Salamah Abu Ghadayin
notes: Killed together with four other people, one ofthem an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, at a cemetary.

name: Ziad Tareq Ziad a-Rifi
notes: Injured by a missile that killed five members of his family while they were on their farmland. Two other members of his family were hit by the missile: one died of his injuries several days later; another, a 9-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs and was kept on life support in hospital, until he succumbed to his injuries some four and a half years later.

name: 'Omar Naser Ziad a-Rifi
notes: Killed with four members of his family on their farmland. Two other family members succumbed to their wounds several days later. Five children under the age of nine were killed in the incident. Another member of the family, a nine-year-old boy, lost the use of all four limbs. He remained on life support at hospital after the injury, and died about four and a half years later.

name: Muhammad Naser Ziad a-Rifi
notes: Injured by a missile that killed seven members of his family while they were on their farmland: five were children under the age of nine; two succumbed to their wounds several days after the incident. Since the injury he was hospitalized, lost the use of all four limbs and was on life support.

name: Hamdan Salem Muhammad Abu Hadayed
notes: Killed when he and his brother, a Popular Front military branch operative, were riding on a motorcycle on Salah a-Din Street. His brother was injured and later died of his wounds.

name: 'Abd a-Rahman Salem Muhammad Abu Hadayed
notes: Injured when he and his brother, an Islamic Jihad military branch operative, were riding on a motorcycle on Salah a-Din Street. His brother was killed.

name: 'Abd a-Rahim Talal Hassan a-Shweikh
notes: Killed together with four other people, one ofthem an operative in the armed wing of Fatah, at a cemetary.

name: Bashir Ahmad Muhammad Abu Shreiteh
notes: Killed together with his nephew while they were filling water from a container in the yard of their home.

name: Awsam Talal Sham'ah Tafesh
notes: Killed together with four other people, two of them operatives in armed wings, at a cemetary.

name: Muhammad Hamdi 'Abd a-Rahman Salem
notes: Killed with his brother and three other people, two of them operatives in an armed wing, at a cemetary.

name: Rami Hamdi 'Abd a-Rahman Salem
notes: Killed with his brother and three other people, two of them operatives in an armed wing, at a cemetary.

name: Husam 'Abd Rabo Muhammad Abu Jaser
notes: Killed while he was working on his farmland.

name: Jum'ah Ibrahim Salem Matar
notes: Killed together with another operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad near the a-Nuseirat towers.

name: Yusef Naser Hussein Kulab
notes: Killed with his mother, two brothers, and three Hamas military branch operatives when his home was bombed. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Ahmad Naser Hussein Kulab
notes: Killed with his mother, two brothers, and three Hamas military branch operatives when his home was bombed. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Mahmoud Tal'at Ahmad Abu Shreiteh
notes: Killed together with his uncle while they were filling water from a container in the yard of their home.

name: Siba Rami Hassan Yunes
notes: Killed at home with her grandmother and grandfather in the bombing of the nearby home of the Kulab family. Four members of the family and three Hamas military branch operatives were killed in the Kulab home. A member of the ‘Aytah family, a woman, was killed in a nearby home. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Hassan Hussein I'bayyan Yunes
notes: Killed at home with his wife and granddaughter in the bombing of the nearby home of the Kulab family. Four members of the family and three Hamas military branch operatives were killed in the Kulab home. A member of the ‘Aytah family, a woman, was killed in a nearby home. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Amal Ibrahim Ahmad Yunes
notes: Killed at home with her husband and granddaughter in the bombing of the nearby home of the Kulab family. Four members of the family and three Hamas military branch operatives were killed in the Kulab home. A member of the ‘Aytah family, a woman, was killed in a nearby home. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: 'Abdallah Naser Hussein Kulab
notes: Killed with his mother, two brothers, and three Hamas military branch operatives when his home was bombed. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: 'Abd al-Fatah Hussein al-'Abed Abu Salimah
notes: Injured in his home in the bombing of the nearby home of the Kulab family. Four members of the family and three Hamas military branch operatives were killed in the Kulab home. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well.

name: Nazirah Ramadan Isma'il Kulab
notes: Killed with three of her sons and three Hamas military branch operatives when her home was bombed. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: 'Aishah Isma'il Hassan 'Atiyyah
notes: Killed at home in the bombing of the nearby home of the Kulab family. Four members of the family and three Hamas military branch operatives were killed in the Kulab home. In a nearby home, three members of the Yunes family were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Muhammad Hamdan Muhammad Barhum
notes: Killed in the Kulab family home along with two other Hamas military branch operatives. Also killed were four members of the Kulab family. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Raed Subhi Ahmad al-'Attar
notes: Killed in the Kulab family home along with two other Hamas military branch operatives. Also killed were four members of the Kulab family. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Muhammad Ibrahim Salah Abu Shamaleh
notes: Killed in the Kulab family home along with two other Hamas military branch operatives. Also killed were four members of the Kulab family. In nearby homes, three members of the Yunes family and a woman, a member of the ‘Aytah family, were killed as well. A man from the Abu Abu Salimah family was injured in a nearby building and later died of his wounds.

name: Muhammad Mustafa Mahmoud a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with one of his brothers when the families’ homes were bombed. In the neighboring home, another brother, his three children and nine-months-pregnant wife were also killed. After she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Iman Yunes Qassem a-Loh
notes: Injured in the bombing of two nearby homes of relatives, which killed seven people. An infant, delivered by C-section after his mother was killed in one of the homes bombed, died later that day.

name: Raafat Mustafa Mahmoud a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with his nine-months-pregnant wife and their three children. After she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. In the neighboring home two of his brothers were killed. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Ahmad Mustafa Mahmoud a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with one of his brothers when the families’ homes were bombed. In the neighboring home, another brother, his three children and nine-months-pregnant wife were also killed. After she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Meyasar Raafat Mustafa a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with his parents, brother and sister. His mother was nine-months pregnant; after she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. Two of his uncles were killed in his grandfather’s home. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Mustafa Raafat Mustafa a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with his parents, brother and sister. His mother was nine months pregnant; after she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. Two of his uncles were killed in his grandfather’s home. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Nabilah's son Raafat Mustafa a-Loh
notes: A day-old infant. He was delivered by C-section after his mother was killed in the bombing of their home. His father, sister and two brothers were also killed. Two of his uncles were killed in his grandfather’s home. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Mahmoud 'Abd al-'Aziz Muhammad al-Bura'i
notes: Killed in the north of a-Nisr neighborhood.

name: Nabilah 'Eid Salamah a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with her husband and three children. She was nine months pregnant. After she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. In the neighboring home two of his brothers were killed. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Muhammad 'Imad Haydar al-'Abet
notes: Killed with his cousin while they were walking with other relatives on Salah a-Din Street, returning to the homes they had fled previously fled.

name: Saher Muhammad Haydar al-'Abet
notes: Killed with his cousin while they were walking with other relatives on Salah a-Din Street, returning to the homes they had fled previously fled.

name: Nur Mahmoud 'Abd al-Basset Abu Hasireh
notes: Killed together with two other people while they were sitting by their home, after a missile was fired at a horse-drawn cart parked nearby.

name: Hani Muhammad Hashem Yasin
notes: Killed together with another man and a three-year-old girl while they were sitting by their home, after a missile was fired at a horse-drawn cart parked nearby.

name: Zaki Suliman Hassan a-Ra'i
notes: Killed together with another man and a three-year-old girl while they were sitting by their home, after a missile was fired at a horse-drawn cart parked nearby.

name: Mustafa Sufian Darwish Muheisen
notes: Killed together with his father while they were working on their farmland.

name: Farah Raafat Mustafa a-Loh
notes: Killed at home with her parents and two brothers. Her mother was nine months pregnant; after she died, the fetus was delivered by C-section, but died later that day. Two of her uncles were killed in her grandfather’s home. Another relative, a young woman, was also injured in another nearby home and later died of her injuries.

name: Sufian Darwish Muhammad Muheisen
notes: Killed together with his son while they were working on their farmland.

name: Ahmad Rabah Shihtah a-Dalu
notes: Killed with his mother and brother (a minor) in their apartment in a building in the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, Gaza City. Muhammad A-Deif, head of the Hamas military branch, also lived in that building. A-Deif’s wife and their two children, a two-year-old girl and a seven-month old baby boy, were also killed in the strike.

name: Widad Mustafa Harb a-Deif
notes: Wife of Muhammad a-Deif, head of the Hamas military branch. Killed with her two-year-old daughter and seven-month-old baby boy in their home the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, Gaza City. Three neighbors, members of the a-Dalu family, one of them a minor and another a Hamas military branch operative, were also killed in the strike.

name: Sarah Muhammad Diab a-Deif
notes: A toddler. The daughter of Muhammad a-Deif, head of the Hamas military branch. Killed with her mother and seven-month-old brother in their home the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, Gaza City. Three neighbors, members of the a-Dalu family, one of them a minor and another a Hamas military branch operative, were also killed in the strike.

name: 'Ali Muhammad Diab a-Deif
notes: seven-month-old infant. The infant son of Muhammad a-Deif, head of the Hamas military branch. Killed with his mother and two-year-old sister, in their home the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, Gaza City. Three neighbors, members of the a-Dalu family, one of them a minor and another a Hamas military branch operative, were also killed in the strike.

name: Mustafa Rabah Shihtah a-Dalu
notes: Killed with his mother and brother, a Hamas military branch operative, in their apartment in a building in the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, Gaza City. Muhammad a-Deif, head of the Hamas military branch, also lived in that building. A-Deif’s wife and their two children, a two-year-old girl and a seven-month old baby boy, were also killed in the strike.

name: Wafa Hussein Ahmad a-Dalu
notes: Killed with her two sons, one of them a minor and the other a Hamas military branch operative, in their apartment in a building in the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, Gaza City. Muhammad A-Deif, head of the Hamas military branch, also lived in that building. A-Deif’s wife and their two children, a two-year-old girl and a seven-month old baby boy, were also killed in the strike.

name: Ibrahim Isma'il Ibrahim Abu 'Odeh
notes: Killed while on his way home in the al-Burah area.

name: Mazen Kamal Sa'id a-Dali
notes: Killed when a missile that landed near his house earlier exploded.

name: Zakaria Musa Dawood Sa'id
notes: Sustained multiple gunshot wounds in the face and body from shots fired by undercover Border Police officers in exchanges of fire that developed in the course of an operation for his arrest.

name: Anas Taysir 'Abd al-Karim al-hinawi
notes: Injured while with other people at Beit Hanoun. Died of his injuries in a hospital in Jordan.

name: Amani al-'Abed Mahmoud Barakah
notes: Killed in her home.

name: Saqer 'Abdallah Fouad Rihan
notes: Killed when he was in the company of other in the neighborhood of Beir al-Na’ja.

name: Anwar Ahmad Mustafa a-Z'anin
notes: Staff member of al-Mizan human rights organization. Injured while riding a motor scooter and stopped to speak to city workers on al-Qaraman street. Died about an hour later, in hospital.

name: Haitham Ramadan Ibrahim al-'Awour
notes: Killed with another Hamas military branch operative in the a-Tawam area.

name: 'Abdallah Salah Muhammad Safi
notes: Killed with another Hamas military branch operative in the a-Tawam area.

name: Ahmad Muhammad 'Atiyyah al-Masri
notes: Killed on his way to a grocery shop, in the bombing of nearby farmland. Two other people were injured.

name: Raed Samir Mahmoud al-Halabi
notes: Executive office manager to Hamas Minister of Interior. Killed at home.

name: Ihssan Mahrus Zakaria al-Agha
notes: Killed with another person when he was returning home from visiting his grandfather. An Islamic Jihad military branch operative was injured in the bombing and later died of his wounds.

name: Faraj Hussein Khamis Abu Rabi'
notes: Killed at home.

name: Khalil Muhammad Ahmad al-'Anati
notes: Shot in the back by a soldier while in the company of other boys and youths who were throwing stones at a military jeep. Died of his wounds in hospital.

name: Hassan Hussein Suliman Kaware'
notes: Killed together with two other people, one of whom was an operative in the armed wing of Islamic Jihad, I the a-Sheikh Nasser area.

name: 'Omar Muhammad 'Awad Jarghon
notes: Killed while standing with other people in the a-Sheikh Nasser area. Two other people were also killed in the incident.

name: Zuhdi 'Abd al-Hamid Abu a-Rus
notes: Killed with three other Hamas military branch operatives in the bombing of the ‘Iz-a-Din al-Qassam Mosque in the refugee camp.

name: Mahmoud Muhammad Ahmad al-Jurani
notes: Killed en route to the evening prayers at the mosque near his home.

name: Haitham Ahmad Salman Abu Samur
notes: Injured in the yard of his home.

name: Nidal Muhammad 'Abd al-Majid Badran
notes: Killed with three other Hamas military branch operatives in the bombing of the ‘Iz-a-Din al-Qassam Mosque in the refugee camp.

name: Tareq Ziad Jadallah
notes: Killed with three other Hamas military branch operatives in the bombing of the ‘Iz-a-Din al-Qassam Mosque in the refugee camp.

name: Mu'az 'Azzam Zayed Abu Zayed
notes: Killed with three other Hamas military branch operatives in the bombing of the ‘Iz-a-Din al-Qassam Mosque in the refugee camp.

name: Aya Anwar Khalil a-Sha'er
notes: Killed in her home which was partially demolished.

name: Muhammad Tamer 'Adel Ibrahim al-'Aidy
notes: Killed riding in a taxi cab. The taxi driver was also killed.

name: Muamen Akram 'Ali al-Masder
notes: Killed together with a relative when riding a motorcycle on Salah a-Din Street near the entrance to al-Maghazi R.C.

name: 'Abd al-Hakim Suliman Salamah al-Masder
notes: Killed together with a relative when riding a motorcycle on Salah a-Din Street near the entrance to al-Maghazi R.C.

name: Sa'id 'Atef 'Abd al-Hamid Tamraz
notes: Killed while driving a taxi, together with his passenger.

name: Ibrahim Zuheir Ibrahim a-Dawawseh
notes: Killed while playing with other children in a-Nur Mosque in the a-Sheikh Radwan neighborhood. Four other children were injured in the strike.

name: Mahmoud Muhammad Saleh Abu Hadaf
notes: Killed at home by rocket-fire together with two members of his family. Six other family members were injured, including a six-year-old boy, who died of his wounds on 6 December 2017.

name: Ahmad Na'im 'Abd Rabo 'Okal
notes: Killed while returning to his home in the al-Khulud neighborhood.

name: Muhammad Ahmad Yusef Qatri
notes: Shot in the chest by a soldier after he threw stones in clashes that erupted during a protest against the military’s actions in Operation Protective Edge.

name: Nader Muhammad Sa'di Abd al-Ghani Idris
notes: Shot in the chest by Border Police officers in clashes that erupted during a protest against the military’s actions in Operation Protective Edge. Died of his wounds on 9 August 2014.

name: Mahmoud Khaled Musa Abu Hadaf
notes: Killed at home by rocket-fire together with two members of his family. Six other family members were injured, including a six-year-old boy, who died of his wounds on 6 December 2017.

name: Suliman Samir Suliman Abu Hadaf
notes: Killed at home by rocket-fire together with two members of his family. Six other family members were injured, including a six-year-old boy, who died of his wounds on 6 December 2017.

name: Muhammad Saleh 'Ayesh Abu Hadaf
notes: Injured by rocket-fire on 8 August 2014, at the entrance to his home. The rocket also injured five members of his family and killed three more family members.

name: Munzer Salman Suliman Qdeih
notes: Killed close to his home near a-Nur Mosque.

name: Muhammad Helmi Ahmad al-'Abadleh
notes: His body was found bythe a-Salam Mosque, close to where he lived.

name: Fadi Jihad Kamel Hamdan
notes: Killed with another Hamas military branch operative.

name: 'Udai Muhammad Qassem al-Astal
